Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Loomis
ShortDescription: EB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Ashland, 51st, Racine, then resume their normal route on 55h, due to police activity near 55th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Ashland, 51st, Racine, then resume their normal route on 55h, due to police activity near 55th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
